duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintaining customer relationships to ensure revenue growth and customer satisfaction.
Work closely with the sales team and customers to identify needs and plan for additional services.
Responsible for revenue protection, churn, and network planning activities for assigned accounts.
Act as the primary post-installation contact and liaison between the customer and internal partners.
Manage account billing, inventory, trouble tickets, SLA, and credit inquiries.
Review service inventories, scorecards, reports, and performance metrics via business review meetings with customers.
Onboard customers to the company's business portal and actively follow orders through internal processing.
Prepare and deliver RFP/RFQ responses, drive renewal negotiations, and participate in post-sales customer meetings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Sales, or related field preferred
